Hey George -- I tried downloading RevJava from their site 
(http://www.serc.nl/people/florijn/work/designchecking/RevJava.htm), but 
it's ignoring my registration...  every time I go through the "name/email" 
form, it bounces me back - Please Register First.

Is there somewhere else to get a copy?  Looks good, and may be a complement 
to PMD.

         Ken

At 03:34 PM 10/22/2002 -0400, you wrote:
>Off the top of my head, most of those don't seem to do the same things as
>junit.  Which is better, a bicycle or a banana?  Why don't you sort your
>list according to what they actually do?  Code coverage testing, for
>example, is orthoganal to unit and regression testing.
>
>I don't know all of those tools, but I know Jtest uses Junit.  And if you're
>looking at static analysis tools, you should also take a look at RevJava.
>
>  - George
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Shay Hassidim [mailto:shay@...]
> > Sent: Tuesday, October 22, 2002 5:16 AM
> > To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> > Subject: [junit] How JUnit is better than other Java testing
> > framework?
> >
> >
> > Hi,
> >
> >
> >
> > I would appreciate info about the advantages of JUnit on top
> > of other Java Testing Frameworks.
> >
> > See other testing frames list below.
> >
> > http://www.aptest.com/resources.html
> >
> >
> > Java Source Test Tools
> >
> >
> > Product       Vendor  Comments
> > GJ-Coverage   Tester's Edge   Coverage tool for Java
> > programs of all types:
> > J2ME, J2SE, and J2EE. Features ease of use, low overhead,
> > HTML reports, branch level coverage, test case breakdowns, and more.
> > JCover        Codework        Java code coverage testing
> > JCover        Man Machine Systems     Java code coverage
> > JStyle        Man Machine Systems     Java source code analyzer.
> > jtest Parasoft        Java class testing
> > junit junit.org       Regression testing framework for the
> > developer who
> > implements unit tests in Java. Open Source
> > JVerify       Man Machine Systems     Java unit/integration testing.
> > Panorama      ISA     Visual environment for Java/C/C++/VB
> > software testing,
> > quality assurance, documentation, and maintenance on
> > Unix/Linux/Windows 95/98/NT/2000
> > QA J  Programming Research    Static analysis checks and
> > metrics that detect
> > inconsistencies and errors in language implementation as well
> > as source code issues involving standards compliance,
> > programming practices and performance, thus enabling fast and
> > efficient development of robust software.
> > QStudio Java  QA Systems GmbH Code quality
> > inspection for Java
> > TCAT for Java Software Research       Code coverage analyzer for Java
>
>
